name: The Tailor's Ghost
description:
Hello, this is my first game jam I have entered. Something small and something to get me started in a more fun way of game development. Please feel free to leave feedback as I will need as much as possible. 

In this game you play as a tailor's ghost that is trying to get the shirt buttons to the other side of the level. The theme was 2 buttons, so I have managed to use the theme in 3 possible ways. There are only 2 shirt buttons you have to move to put on the push down buttons while only using 2 keyboard buttons.

Enjoy

You can keep tabs on what game jam I'm doing or any updates at https://discord.gg/2CNx7Hp
